p: A series of cardanol-based plasticizers were produced by Yang group [ 111]. The chemical structure and synthesis route of cardanol esters are shown in Figure 5a,f,g,h and Figure 23. These caedanol esters decrease T g of PVC and show excellent biodegradability and migration stability. Biodegradability of cardanol esters are better than cardanol, which provides potential methods to solve environmental problems produced by non-degradability of cardanol.
